channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Will TikTok Be Banned in January? That Question is Headed to Court
item.description: TikTok will be in federal court on Monday, aiming to block a new law that will ban the popular video app in the United States early next year.

item.title: In Georgia, a Political Uproar Erupts Over a 2008 War With Russia
item.description: The leader of the governing party said the country should apologize for a conflict for which many Georgians blame Moscow, heightening a monthslong pol...

item.title: One of the final messages from the doomed Titan submersible was ‘all good here’
item.description: The Titan imploded in the North Atlantic in June 2023, killing all five people on board and setting off a worldwide debate about the future of private...

item.title: 2024 Emmys: Best and Worst Moments From the Awards Show
item.description: It was a good night for diversity and kilts, but one also marked by shameless ads and … humidity? (Why was everyone so shiny?)

item.title: Death Toll Rises as Deadly Floods Threaten Central Europe: What We Know
item.description: At least 17 people have died and thousands have been displaced. “Relief is not expected to come before tomorrow, and more likely, the day after,” an o...

item.title: United Airlines will offer free Wi-Fi after striking deal with Elon Musk’s SpaceX for Starlink service
item.description: Rollout to the entire fleet will take a few years, though.

item.title: Pressure Grows on Mayor Adams as Key Officials Leave Amid Investigations
item.description: Mayor Eric Adams and his inner circle are under investigation, and two top New York City officials have resigned. Can the mayor still turn things arou...

item.title: Top Biden Aide Visits Israel Amid Fears of Escalation With Hezbollah
item.description: The visit by the adviser, Amos Hochstein, comes as cross-border clashes between Israel’s military and the powerful Lebanese militia have intensified.

item.title: A Tesla Cybertruck owner had to replace the tires after just 6,000 miles
item.description: And they’re not happy about that.

item.title: One Issue Where Israeli Extremists Are Mainstream
item.description: Israel’s annexation of the occupied West Bank is not a future prospect; it is a fact of life. Israelis and Palestinians live in a one-state reality.

item.title: How a Tourist Paradise Became a Drug-Trafficking Magnet

item.title: America’s national debt is ballooning—and any real solutions can only be bipartisan
item.description: Neither party seems to be seriously addressing a key issue: The national debt.

item.title: State of the Race: Early Signs of a Post-Debate Bounce for Harris
item.description: It could be another week until the full scope of possible gains is evident.

item.title: Russia Ramps Up Air Assault on Ukrainian Cities
